resources.string: You need to choose a larger number!\nTake your time, think and only then click on the picture with the answer.
"Congratulations, level passed!\n Did you know that 7 is a lucky number? There are 7 days a week, 7 continents, 7 colors of the rainbow, 7 musical notes, and more."
Just simple math! You need to do addition of numbers. Good luck!
"This is your score!\n Adding one more to one, we write two, but in our mind we still keep three))))
Just simple math! You need to do subtraction of numbers. Good luck!
"This is your score!\n Mathematics is the gymnastics of the mind!))))
Just simple math! You need to do multiplication of numbers. Good luck!
"This is your score!\n All arts gravitate towards music; all sciences to mathematics.))))
Just simple math! You need to do division of numbers. Good luck!
"This is your score!\n Arithmetic is impossible to understand, you have to believe in it!))))
Final level! All completed operations are collected here. Good luck!
"This is your score!\n Mathematics is the queen of sciences!))))
